projectDescription: A modern, professional website for a driving school in Hamilton, Ontario. The platform offers private, patient, 1-on-1 driving lessons for G2 and G road test preparation, including parking mastery, highway confidence, and road test prep. The site features online lesson booking, service information, pricing packages, customer testimonials, and contact functionality.
targetAudience: Learner drivers in Hamilton, Ontario seeking private driving instruction for G2 and G road tests

coreFeatures.description: Modal-based booking system allowing users to schedule driving lessons by providing their name, phone number, selecting a service type (G2 Road-Test Prep, G Road-Test Prep, Refresher Lessons, Parking Intensive, Highway Confidence), and choosing a preferred date and time
coreFeatures.userStory: As a potential customer, I want to easily book a driving lesson online so that I can schedule instruction at my convenience
acceptanceCriteria: Booking modal opens when 'Book Lesson' button is clicked
Form validates all required fields (name, phone, service type, date/time)
Phone number validation ensures proper format
Name must be at least 2 characters
Success message is displayed after submission
Form resets after successful submission
Modal can be closed via close button or overlay click

coreFeatures.description: Single-page application with client-side routing to multiple pages including Home, Services, About, Contact, Reviews, Pricing, Privacy, and Terms pages with lazy loading for optimal performance
coreFeatures.userStory: As a visitor, I want to easily navigate between different sections of the website to find the information I need
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu is visible and accessible on all pages
All navigation links work correctly
Pages load quickly with lazy loading
404 page is shown for invalid routes
Back/forward browser navigation works correctly

coreFeatures.description: Comprehensive display of driving lesson services offered including G2 preparation, G preparation, refresher courses, parking lessons, and highway training
coreFeatures.userStory: As a potential customer, I want to see detailed information about available services to choose the right lesson type for my needs
acceptanceCriteria: Services page displays all available lesson types
Each service includes clear description
Service information is easy to read and understand
Call-to-action buttons are present for booking

coreFeatures.description: Transparent pricing display with three package tiers: Starter ($49 for single 60-min lesson), Standard ($129 for 3 lessons), and Pro ($249 for 6 lessons with highway practice and mock test)
coreFeatures.userStory: As a potential customer, I want to see clear pricing information to understand costs before booking
acceptanceCriteria: All pricing tiers are displayed clearly
Each package shows price and included features
Popular/recommended package is highlighted
Pricing is consistent across home and pricing pages

coreFeatures.description: Carousel display of customer reviews and ratings to build trust and showcase student success stories
coreFeatures.userStory: As a potential customer, I want to read reviews from other students to understand the quality of instruction
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials are displayed in a carousel/slider
Each testimonial shows student name, rating, and feedback
Reviews page displays multiple testimonials
5-star ratings are clearly visible

coreFeatures.description: Multiple ways to contact the driving school including phone number, contact form, and business hours
coreFeatures.userStory: As a visitor, I want to easily contact the driving school to ask questions or get more information
acceptanceCriteria: Phone number is clickable and initiates call on mobile devices
Contact form is functional with validation
Business hours are clearly displayed
Contact page is easily accessible from navigation

coreFeatures.description: Mobile-first responsive design ensuring optimal viewing and interaction experience across all devices and screen sizes
coreFeatures.userStory: As a mobile user, I want the website to work perfectly on my smartphone so I can browse and book lessons on the go
acceptanceCriteria: Site is fully functional on mobile devices (375px width and up)
All buttons and forms are easily clickable on touch screens
Text is readable without zooming
Navigation adapts to mobile layout
Images scale appropriately for different screen sizes

coreFeatures.description: Comprehensive SEO implementation including meta tags, Open Graph tags for social sharing, structured data (JSON-LD) for search engines, and canonical URLs
coreFeatures.userStory: As a business owner, I want the website to rank well in search engines so more potential customers can find us
acceptanceCriteria: All pages have unique, descriptive meta titles and descriptions
Open Graph tags are present for social media sharing
Structured data (JSON-LD) is implemented for local business
Canonical URLs prevent duplicate content issues
Sitemap.xml and robots.txt are present

coreFeatures.description: Strategic placement of 'Call Now' and 'Book Lesson' buttons throughout the site with micro-animations to encourage user engagement
coreFeatures.userStory: As a visitor ready to take action, I want to easily find and click call or book buttons from any page
acceptanceCriteria: Call Now button initiates phone call on click
Book Lesson button opens booking modal
CTAs are visible on all key pages
Buttons have hover and click animations
Floating call button appears on mobile

requirements: React 18 with TypeScript for type safety
Vite for fast development and optimized builds
React Router DOM v6 for client-side routing
React Hook Form for form state management
Client-side validation with user-friendly error messages
Headless UI for accessible modal dialogs
Lucide React for consistent icon set
Code splitting for optimal bundle size

nonFunctionalRequirements.description: Pages should load in under 3 seconds on standard broadband connection
Site should be keyboard navigable and screen reader friendly
Support for modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) within last 2 versions
Full functionality on iOS and Android devices
All pages should be indexable by search engines with proper meta tags and structured data

futureEnhancements: Backend API integration for actual booking submission
Customer account portal for managing bookings
